contentrichtext.text: '''Ferdinand III''' may refer to: * [[Ferdinand III of Castile]], ''the Saint'' (1199–1252, king from 1217) * [[Ferdinand III of Naples]] ''the Catholic'' (1452–1516, king from 1504) (Ferdinand V of Castile and Ferdinand II of Aragon and of Sicily), husband of Isabella of Castile * [[Ferdinand III, Holy Roman Emperor]] (1608–1657, emperor from 1637) * [[Ferdinand III of Sicily]] (1751–1825, king 1759–1816) (= Ferdinand IV of Naples 1759–1799; 1799–1806; 1815–1816) * [[Ferdinand III of Tuscany]] (1769–1824, grand-duke 1791–1799 and 1814–1824) {{hndis|name=Ferdinand}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Ferdinand}} [[eo:Ferdinando (regantoj)#Ferdinando la 3-a]]
